EmailTemplate.name: 202009_Global_Email_IMU_Intergeo Meeting Invite_JRD.Email #1
EmailTemplate.subject: Meet the HGuide Team During Intergeo
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
MyAerospace Portal <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace]]> | Contact Us <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/contact-us]]> | View in browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Forward to a friend <[[{{system.forwardToFriendLink}}]]>
{{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Intergeo is right around the corner and while it’s entirely virtual, we’d like to meet with you to discuss your navigation needs.
While 2020 has been challenging, we’re proud to have launched two new products this year with more exciting options on the way.
- HGuide i200 inertial measurement unit <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/products/sensors/hguide-i200-mems-inertial-measurement-unit]]> - HGuide n380 inertial navigation system <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/products/sensors/hguide-n380-inertialgnss-navigator]]>
To schedule a virtual face-to-face meeting via Microsoft Teams, please reach out to one of our HGuide sales leaders:
- Schedule a meeting with Jon Thorland (Americas) <[[mailto:jon.thorland@honeywell.com]]> - Schedule a meeting with Darren Fisher (APAC + EMEAI) <[[darren.fisher@honeywell.com]]> - Schedule a meeting with Vandit Bhurat (India) <[[mailto:vandit.bhurat@honeywell.com]]>
Not registered for Intergeo? Let us know and we'll get you a free three-day pass.
We’re excited for the future and look forward to partnering with you to advance new offerings to your customers.
Sincerely,
The HGuide Team HGuide Customer Support
Getting technical support across any of our HGuide products has never been easier. To access our FAQs or to speak with one of our applications engineers, visit our new HGuide Support page.
Get Support <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/hguide-customer-support]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero]]> <[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace]]> <[[https://twitter.com/honeywell_aero]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/honeywell_aero/]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneywellAviation]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneywellDefense]]>
